response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $1,300,000. I understand its value to you stands at $1,200,000, and I hope this offer strikes a balance that benefits us both. Should you find this proposal favorable, please let me know so we can proceed with the details of the transaction. Thank you for considering my offer.", "product_price": 1300000}
